wikipedia_page.main: Sir Andrew Cook  (born October 1949) is a British industrialist, philanthropist, historian, and author. He is the owner and chairman of William Cook Holdings Limited, one of Europe's leading steel and engineering groups.

response: * Andrew Cook, Chairman, William Cook plc. For services to the Steel Castings Industry.
*Andrew Cook (businessman) (born 1949), chairman of William Cook Group
*Andrew Cook (footballer), footballer in 2010–11 East Fife F.C. season
*Andrew Cook, a character in Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman played by Brandon Douglas
